name: @respond-framework/rudy
description: think of your app in states not routes (and, yes, while keeping the address bar in sync)

scripts.prepare: yarn run build:cjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run flow-copy && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.build:es: BABEL_ENV=es babel --root-mode upward --source-maps true src -d es
scripts.build: yarn run build:cjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.flow-copy: flow-copy-source src dist && flow-copy-source src es
scripts.flow-watch: clear; printf "\033[3J" & npm run flow & fswatch -o ./ | xargs -n1 -I{} sh -c 'clear; printf "\033[3J" && npm run flow'
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf es && rimraf coverage

author: James Gillmore <james@faceyspacey.com>
